name: Pastel Punk Dream
description:
The model is still in beta and the base model (version "b") produces a semi-realistic 3D look heavily influenced by anime.

It's great for any RPG style and has vibrant Pastel colors.

Additionally, if you want more of a 2D look there is an Anime optimized model, you can use the Anime optimized model (version "a") or adjust the level of anime-style rendering of either model using any LORA or hypernet between 0.05 to 0.5, depending on the style you prefer. Many of the examples were created using Wano LORA. To achieve this desired effect, install "Wanostyle" and add it to the prompt.

https://civitai.com/models/4219

Please note that the examples have been created using a combination of clip skip 1 & 2.

I don't require any credit if you use my model, but it would be greatly appreciated if you could include any of the hashtags #PastelPunkDream #PastelPunkRPGDream #PastelPunkAnime in your posts. This way, I can see what people are making with the model. Additionally, consider leaving a review so I can get a better understanding of how people are using the model and how I can improve it.

modelVersions.name: v0.1b Pastel Punk Dream (Base)
modelVersions.description:
VAE baked in, Beta Base model.

The base model is the result of combining five different models with specific weights: DreamShaper v3.3.2 at 50%, RPG v4 at 25%, Pastel Anime mix at 12.5%, Synthpunk Search raw at 8.75%, and Anything v3 at 3.75%.

This version needs a LORA or Hypernet for great 2D anime results; look at wano from the link above. It can do pretty good 2D with "(3D Model!:1.9)" in the negative prompt but I get more consistent results with different LORA. RPGv4 trigger words work well.

modelVersions.name: v0.1a Pastel Punk Anime
modelVersions.description:
VAE baked in, Beta Anime model.

This model is optimized for anime, no need to use a Hypernet or LORA to get Anime results. The anime optimized model is the result of combining five different models with specific weights: 55.85% at Anything v3, 24.46875% at Synthpunk Search raw, 11.25% at DreamShaper v3.3.2, 5.625% at RPG v4, and 2.8125% at Pastel Anime mix.

Include "(80s-90s retro anime or 20XX anime + style "name" anime:1.3)" in the prompt, depending on the desired era. You can adjust the value in the brackets, within the range of 1.05 to 1.6, to achieve a more 2D appearance and reduce the 3D cel shading effect produced by the model. With 60% of its training focused on anime, this model is highly responsive to trigger words. The use of LORA or Hypernet is optional, but they may offer more consistent results or simplify the process of creating a simple style. Additionally, adding "(3D model!:1.x)" to the negative prompt with weight can help.
